list_definition.definition: a look on one’s face that shows one’s feelings

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He always has a bored expression on his face.

list_definition.definition: (a) showing of thoughts or feelings by words, actions etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This poem is an expression of his grief.

list_definition.definition: the showing of feeling when eg reciting, reading aloud or playing a musical instrument

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Put more expression into your playing!
